SUITABILITY.TITLE: Suitability Map
SUITABILITY.DESCRIPTION: Shows what crops are best to plant in a specific area to attain maximum yield.

LEVELS.TITLE: Suitability Level
LEVELS.LEVEL_2: Moderately suitable with limitation in elevation
LEVELS.LEVEL_3: Moderately suitable with limitation in slope
LEVELS.LEVEL_4: Moderately suitable with limitation in soil
LEVELS.LEVEL_5: Moderately suitable with limitation in elevation and slope
LEVELS.LEVEL_6: Moderately suitable with limitation in slope and soil
LEVELS.LEVEL_7: Moderately suitable with limitation in elevation and soil
LEVELS.LEVEL_8: Moderately suitable with limitation in elevation, slope and soil
LEVELS.LEVEL_9: Marginally suitable with limitation in elevation
LEVELS.LEVEL_10: Marginally suitable with limitation in slope
LEVELS.LEVEL_11: Marginally suitable with limitation in soil
LEVELS.LEVEL_12: Marginally suitable with limitation in elevation and slope
LEVELS.LEVEL_13: Marginally suitable with limitation in slope and soil
LEVELS.LEVEL_14: Marginally suitable with limitation in elevation and soil
LEVELS.LEVEL_15: Marginally suitable with limitation in elevation, slope and soil
